title: Damiano's Return
description: Damiano Braganzi is back! Damiano-the husband whom Eden had thought she'd never see again....Eden and Damiano had been married only a short time when he disappeared, and things had not been good between them. So, though Eden knows her love for Damiano is as strong as ever, she fears that he will want a divorce...unless she can overcome her hang-ups in the bedroom....
author: Lynne Graham
